synopsis.text: Whether it's his relentless optimism or his unyielding determination, Shuuzou 'Shuu' Matsutani's life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a mysterious blue-haired girl, Lala-Ru, atop a smokestack. His attempts to communicate with her lead him into a desolate future world, parched of water and ruled by the merciless dictator, Hamdo. In this harsh reality, children are forced to become soldiers, and girls are abducted for breeding purposes. Shuu, now trapped in this grim world, must navigate through the horrors of war, including genocide, brutal torture, and child exploitation, in order to save Lala-Ru and his newfound friends. With Lala-Ru's ability to manipulate water through her pendant, Shuu must find a way to escape the clutches of Hamdo's regime and return home, all while clinging onto his values. Will Shuu's unwavering spirit be enough to overcome the odds and save those he cares about? Only time will tell in this haunting tale of survival and hope.
